prompts.explanation: An informal way of telling someone they are always welcome to visit.
prompts.prompt: A male neighbor waving from their doorstep with an inviting smile.
prompts.negative_prompt: Closed doors, unwelcoming body language, gloomy atmosphere.

prompts.phrase: Let me lend you a hand.
prompts.explanation: A helpful offer when a neighbor or friend seems to be struggling with something.
prompts.prompt: One male person carry groceries up the stairs.
prompts.negative_prompt: Indifference, ignoring someone in need, chaotic background.

prompts.phrase: Give me a shout if you need anything!
prompts.explanation: An offer to help if needed, often said to a neighbor.
prompts.prompt: An old man waving from their front yard while smiling.
